explanations.B: 5 + 12 = 17, but we want the length of the other side. How can we find the missing side, if the total length of all three sides is 30?
explanations.C: Not quite - I think you found that the other two sides add up to 17, but then how do we find the missing side if the total perimeter is 30? We could say 17 + ___ = 30...
